class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.Unit
class.meta: Domain entity representing a unit of movement
CREATE INDEX inv_unit_vstate_tdcalc_idx ON inv_unit ( visit_state, time_denorm_calc);

property.name: unitId
property.meta: Unit Identifier:Container number, Chassis number, Marks and Numbers, etc. An name by which people identify this Unit.

property.name: unitForeignHostKey
property.meta: Unique key of the Unit in a foreign host (if any).

property.name: unitVisitState
property.meta: The current state of the Unit.

property.name: unitNeedsReview
property.meta: If true, Unit was created on-the-fly and needs to be manually reviewed.

property.name: unitArePlacardsMismatched
property.meta: False if Unit's Hazard placards and observed placards match, True otherwise

many-to-one.name: unitDeclaredIbCv
many-to-one.meta: The declared/documented inbound carrier to the Complex, which may differ from the actual

property.name: unitCategory
property.meta: The Category of the Unit (Import, Export, ...).

many-to-one.name: unitComplex
many-to-one.meta: The Complex to which this Unit belongs.

many-to-one.name: unitGoods
many-to-one.meta: The Goods asscoiated with this Unit. May be null.

property.name: unitDeckRqmnt
property.meta: A stowage requirement: Above Deck Only, Below Deck Only, or Don't Care

property.name: unitRequiresPower
property.meta: True if Unit needs power to its reefer unit, or, in case of porthole reefer, forced air

property.name: unitIsPowered
property.meta: True if Unit is connected to electrical supply or, in case of porthole reefer, forced air exchange

property.name: unitWantPowered
property.meta: True if opertions wants Unit connected to electrical supply or, in case of porthole reefer, forced air exchange

property.name: unitPowerRqstTime
property.meta: Time of last power state change request

property.name: unitIsAlarmOn
property.meta: True if Unit alarm is on

property.name: unitValidateReleaseGroup
property.meta: True if release group must be validated

property.name: unitIsTransferableRelease
property.meta: True if release can be transferred to another Unit

property.name: unitGoodsAndCtrWtKg
property.meta: Goods and Container weight in Kgs (gross weight)

property.name: unitGoodsAndCtrWtKgAdvised
property.meta: Goods and Container weight in Kgs (gross weight) when the container was booked/advised.

property.name: unitGoodsAndCtrWtKgGateMeasured
property.meta: Goods and Container weight in Kgs (gross weight) as recorded by gate scales.

property.name: unitGoodsAndCtrWtKgYardMeasured
property.meta: Goods and Container weight in Kgs (gross weight) as recorded by CHE in yard.

property.name: unitGoodsAndCtrWtKgQcMeasured
property.meta: Goods and Container weight in Kgs (gross weight) as recorded by Quay Crane.

property.name: unitGoodsAndCtrWtKgVerfiedGross
property.meta: Goods and Container weight in Kgs (VGM-Verified Gross Mass) as verified by Terminal.

property.name: unitGrossWeightSource
property.meta: Source for the Verified Gross Mass in Unit

property.name: unitVgmEntity
property.meta: Verifier of the Gross Mass Ex: Load port, Shipper.

property.name: unitIgnorePayloadWeights
property.meta: If true, do not add weight of payload units when calculating total weight

property.name: unitIgnorePayloadHeights
property.meta: If true, do not add height of payload units when calculating total height

property.name: unitIsStowplanPosted
property.meta: If the equipment use is for a container arriving the terminal by Vessel, whether the Baplie message for that particular Vessel has the container.

property.name: unitIsCtrSealed
property.meta: True if any of the four seals has a value

property.name: unitIsBundle
property.meta: True if Unit is a Bundle

many-to-one.name: unitActiveUfv
many-to-one.meta: The most recently activated child UFV, though not necessarily ACTIVE now

set.name: unitUeSet
set.meta: The set of all UnitFacilityVisits for this Unit.

many-to-one.name: unitPrimaryUe
many-to-one.meta: A direct (denormalized) pointer to the primary unit equipment. Can be null.

many-to-one.name: unitCarriageUe
many-to-one.meta: A direct (denormalized) pointer to the carriage unit equipment. Can be null.

many-to-one.name: rtgOPL
many-to-one.meta: Original Port of Loading (international cargo was relayed through a domestic port of loading)

many-to-one.name: rtgDeclaredCv
many-to-one.meta: Declared Carrier Visit (may differ from actual!)

property.name: rtgDescription
property.meta: Source of the instructions for the routing change (fax received, e-mail, etc.)

many-to-one.name: rtgTruckingCompany
many-to-one.meta: Option to change from the one that is associated with the delivery group

many-to-one.name: rtgBondTruckingCompany
many-to-one.meta: Trucking Company which is responsible to pick up the Container that has been marked for either Offsite Exam or is being taken Offsite into Inbond

property.name: unitImportDeliveryOrderExpiryDate
property.meta: The time this individual container's delivery order expires.

property.name: unitTimeDenormalizeCalc
property.meta: The last time at which denormalized fields were recalculated.

property.name: unitTimeLastStateChange
property.meta: The last time at which the UnitVisitState changed.

property.name: unitStoppedVessel
property.meta: Denormalized stop flag for SPARCS: if TRUE, vessel load is disallowed

property.name: unitStoppedRail
property.meta: Denormalized stop flag for SPARCS: if TRUE, rail load is disallowed

property.name: unitStoppedRoad
property.meta: Denormalized stop flag for SPARCS: if TRUE, road delivery is disallowed

property.name: unitInbond
property.meta: Container is marked to leave the terminal on a bonded trucker (going inbond, inbond and cancel)

property.name: unitExam
property.meta: Container is marked to leave the terminal on a bonded trucker for an exam (onsite, offsite, offsite&return and cancel)

property.name: unitCustomsId
property.meta: Customs id - additional information to identify unit

property.name: unitCargoQuantityUnit
property.meta: Volume or weight units (kilograms, gallons, etc.) of cargo quantity

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.EqBaseOrderItem
class.meta: Base class for orders/reservations items for Equipment

many-to-one.name: eqboiOrder
many-to-one.meta: The Equipment Order item is listed on

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.EqBaseOrder
class.meta: Base class for orders/reservations for Equipment

property.name: eqboSubType
property.meta: Order subtype, so we can query invisible descriminator

property.name: eqboNbr
property.meta: Order number, just so we can display this in inventory

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.EquipmentState
class.meta: Represents the state of an Equipment from perspective of an Operator

many-to-one.name: eqsOperator
many-to-one.meta: The (Topology) Operator whose perspective is being modeled

many-to-one.name: eqsEqPreviousOperator
many-to-one.meta: Previous operator of the Equipment, if known

many-to-one.name: eqsEqOwner
many-to-one.meta: Owner of the Equipment, if known

property.name: eqsEqUseMode
property.meta: Mode of use of the Equipment

many-to-one.name: eqsObsoleteDamages
many-to-one.meta: The Damages asscoiated with this Unit Equipment. May be null.

property.name: eqsOffhireLocation
property.meta: Off-hire location for this piece of Equipment

property.name: eqsLastPosLocType
property.meta: An Enum giving the type of position of the Equipment's last known position

property.name: eqsLastPosName
property.meta: A String formatted for the user that represents the last known position

many-to-one.name: eqsLastFacility
many-to-one.meta: The Facility of the last position, if known

property.name: eqsTimeLastMove
property.meta: Time this Equipment was last moved

property.name: eqsTripCount
property.meta: Number that represents equipment trip count

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.UnitEquipment
class.meta: Domain entity representing the use of an Equipment by a Unit

property.name: ueEqRole
property.meta: The role the Equipment plays with respect to the Unit.

property.name: ueAttachTime
property.meta: The time the Equipment was first attached to the Unit

property.name: ueDetachTime
property.meta: The time the Equipment was detached from the Unit

many-to-one.name: ueEquipmentState
many-to-one.meta: The EquipmentState of the Equipment (which makes ueEquipment redundant)

many-to-one.name: ueObsoleteEqOperator
many-to-one.meta: Current operator of the unit equipment

property.name: ueObsoleteEqUseMode
property.meta: Mode of use of the unit equipment

property.name: ueBadNbr
property.meta: Records the original EquipId when User has redefined ueEquipment

property.name: ueIsFolded
property.meta: True if this is a folded flatrack

property.name: ueSparcsDamageCode
property.meta: The sparcs damage code representing the damages of this unit equipment.

many-to-one.name: ueDamages
many-to-one.meta: The Damages asscoiated with this Unit Equipment. May be null.

many-to-one.name: ueArrivalOrderItem
many-to-one.meta: The order via which the subject Equipment will/has arrived at the Complex

many-to-one.name: ueDepartureOrderItem
many-to-one.meta: The order via which the subject Equipment will/has departed the Complex

property.name: ueIsReserved
property.meta: True if this unit is reserved for or went out against an order

property.name: ueObsoleteIsCurrentUse
property.meta: True if this UE represents the current use of the Equipment for this Operator

property.name: ueObsoleteReturnToLocation
property.meta: Return to location for this UE

property.name: uePlacarded
property.meta: Has the unit equipment been placarded

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.GoodsBase
class.meta: Domain entity representing the valuables/goods being transported

property.name: gdsIsHazardous
property.meta: TRUE if the Goods contain hazardous substances (denormalization)

property.name: gdsImdgTypes
property.meta: Comma delimitted list of IMDG types within the Unit (denormalization)

property.name: gdsThreeMainHazardUNNumbers
property.meta: The UN numbers of the three most severe hazards.

many-to-one.name: gdsHazards
many-to-one.meta: The Hazards asscoiated with these Goods. May be null.

property.name: rfreqTempShowFahrenheit
property.meta: If TRUE, users want to see temperatures for this in Fahrenheit, not Centigrade

property.name: rfreqVentUnit
property.meta: Unit (%,cubic feet per minute, etc.) that goes with the vent required field

property.name: rfreqLatestOnPowerTime
property.meta: Time by which the Unit must be on-power to meet customer requirements

property.name: rfreqRequestedOffPowerTime
property.meta: Time by which the Unit should be taken off-power

property.name: rfreqTimeMonitor1
property.meta: 1st time by which reefer should be monitored

property.name: rfreqTimeMonitor2
property.meta: 2nd time by which reefer should be monitored

property.name: rfreqTimeMonitor3
property.meta: 3rd time by which reefer should be monitored

property.name: rfreqTimeMonitor4
property.meta: 4th time by which reefer should be monitored

property.name: rfreqMinutesBeforeUnplugWarning
property.meta: Number of minutes Reefer can be unplugged without damaging contents

property.name: rfreqExtendedTimeMonitors
property.meta: Determines reefer requires additional monitor times. If TRUE, requires additional monitoring times

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.UnitFacilityVisit
class.meta: Domain entity representing the passage of a Unit through a Facility

property.name: ufvHorizon
property.meta: number that presents time_out as horizon

property.name: ufvVisitState
property.meta: The current state of the Unit with respect to this Facility.

property.name: ufvTransitState
property.meta: Describes the UFV's transit through the Facility.

component.name: ufvArrivePosition
component.meta: The position on arrival. Will be a truck, train, or vessel position

property.name: posLocType
property.meta: An Enum giving the type of position

property.name: posLocId
property.meta: A String giving the Id of the location: either a yard code, or carrier visit Id

property.name: posLocGkey
property.meta: The gkey of the Yard or CarrierVisit of this Position

property.name: posSlot
property.meta: A String giving the coordinates of the Position within its Location

property.name: posOrientation
property.meta: A String defining the orientation of the Unit within this Position

property.name: posName
property.meta: A String formatted for the user that represents the position

property.name: posOperationalPosId
property.meta: XPS operation position (TIP, TQ, LN.4, etc.)

many-to-one.name: posBin
many-to-one.meta: The bin to which this Position points to.

property.name: posTier
property.meta: An integer specifying the tier for this Position.

property.name: posAnchor
property.meta: xyz anchor point in bin's coordinate system.

property.name: posOrientationDegrees
property.meta: Orientation in degrees in bin's coordinate system.

component.name: ufvLastKnownPosition
component.meta: The last known position of the Unit from the perspective of this facility

property.name: posLocType
property.meta: An Enum giving the type of position

property.name: posLocId
property.meta: A String giving the Id of the location: either a yard code, or carrier visit Id

property.name: posLocGkey
property.meta: The gkey of the Yard or CarrierVisit of this Position

property.name: posSlot
property.meta: A String giving the coordinates of the Position within its Location

property.name: posOrientation
property.meta: A String defining the orientation of the Unit within this Position

property.name: posName
property.meta: A String formatted for the user that represents the position

property.name: posOperationalPosId
property.meta: XPS operation position (TIP, TQ, LN.4, etc.)

many-to-one.name: posBin
many-to-one.meta: The bin to which this Position points to.

property.name: posTier
property.meta: An integer specifying the tier for this Position.

property.name: posAnchor
property.meta: xyz anchor point in bin's coordinate system.

property.name: posOrientationDegrees
property.meta: Orientation in degrees in bin's coordinate system.

property.name: ufvTimeOfLastMove
property.meta: The time at which the ufvLastKnownPosition was most recently updated.

property.name: ufvTimeOfLoading
property.meta: The time at which the ufv was loaded to the outbound carrier.

property.name: ufvTimeEcIn
property.meta: Time at which the EC-IN UFV state began (=discharge time for imports)

property.name: ufvTimeEcOut
property.meta: Time at which the EC-OUT UFV state began (gate transaction complete for delivery)

property.name: ufvTimeIn
property.meta: The time at which the Unit was received into the facility.

property.name: ufvTimeOut
property.meta: The time at which the Unit was delivered from the facility.

property.name: ufvDlvTimeAppntmnt
property.meta: The scheduled time of the delivery appointment.

property.name: ufvTimeInventory
property.meta: The time at which the Unit's yard position was last confirmed.

property.name: ufvTimeComplete
property.meta: The time at which this UFV became a historical UFV. If null, it is 'live'.

many-to-one.name: ufvUnit
many-to-one.meta: The Unit to which this UnitFacilityVisit belongs

property.name: ufvSequence
property.meta: The facility calling sequence: 1=first facility, 2=second, etc. 0=unknown

many-to-one.name: ufvIntendedObCv
many-to-one.meta: The intended outbound carrier, which may differ from the actual

property.name: ufvYardStowageType
property.meta: Enum giving type of yard stowage required: stacked, wheeled, either

property.name: ufvIsSparcsStopped
property.meta: True if the simple SPARCS-originated 'stop' is placed on this Unit

property.name: ufvHasChanged
property.meta: True if SPARCS user has not cleared the change flag

property.name: ufvVerifiedForLoad
property.meta: True if SPARCS user has verified the Unit for loading

property.name: ufvVerifiedYardPosition
property.meta: True if SPARCS user has verified the Unit's yard position

property.name: ufvAnomalyForExpDkng
property.meta: True if SPARCS should ignore this Unit when evaluating types of Units present in Expert Decking

many-to-one.name: ufvActualIbCv
many-to-one.meta: The actual inbound carrier, i.e., the one the Unit physically arrived upon. Defined upon facility arrival.

many-to-one.name: ufvActualObCv
many-to-one.meta: The actual outbound carrier, i.e., the one the Unit physically departed upon. Defined upon facility departure.

property.name: ufvPaidThruDay
property.meta: Day thru which demurrage charges have been paid for Storage

property.name: ufvGuaranteeThruDay
property.meta: Day thru which demurrage charges have been guaranteed for Storage

many-to-one.name: ufvGuaranteeParty
many-to-one.meta: The business party agreeing to guarantee storage charges for Storage

property.name: ufvPowerLastFreeDay
property.meta: Last Free Day for reefer Power charge

property.name: ufvPowerPaidThruDay
property.meta: Day thru which reefer power charges have been paid

property.name: ufvPowerGuaranteeThruDay
property.meta: Day thru which reefer charges have been guaranteed for Power

many-to-one.name: ufvPowerGuaranteeParty
many-to-one.meta: The business party agreeing to guarantee reefer charges for Power

property.name: ufvLineLastFreeDay
property.meta: Last Free Day for Line Storage

property.name: ufvLinePaidThruDay
property.meta: Day thru which demurrage charges have been paid for Line Storage

property.name: ufvLineGuaranteeThruDay
property.meta: Day thru which demurrage charges have been guaranteed for Line Storage

many-to-one.name: ufvLineGuaranteeParty
many-to-one.meta: The business party agreeing to guarantee storage charges for Line Storage

property.name: ufvVisibleInSparcs
property.meta: If TRUE, this Unit is visible in SPARCS

property.name: ufvIsDirectIbToObMove
property.meta: True if the discharge/load is a direct move to/from road truck.

property.name: ufvValidateMarryErrors
property.meta: Any error that occurred during the container-chassis marry request.

property.name: ufvStowFactor
property.meta: Stow Factor for the Unit. The field is computed and managed by XPS.

property.name: ufvReturnToYard
property.meta: If set to true then a UNIT_DELIVER_REJECTED event will be generated when the unit is unloaded

property.name: ufvMoveCount
property.meta: No. of moves done for a unit during its unit facility visit

property.name: ufvIsRASPriority
property.meta: True if the Unit should be prioritized by Rail AutoStow

property.name: ufvStackingFactor
property.meta: Stacking Factor for the Unit. The field is computed and managed by XPS.

property.name: ufvSectionFactor
property.meta: Section Factor for the Unit. The field is computed and managed by XPS.

property.name: ufvPreferredTransferLocation
property.meta: Preferred transfer location at the origin

property.name: ufvDoorDirection
property.meta: Computed Field to maintain Door Direction based on current Yard Block direction

property.name: ufvOptimalRailTZSlot
property.meta: Optimal Rail Transfer Zone Slot populated by N4. Readonly for XPS and ECN4

property.name: ufvCarrierIncompatibleReason
property.meta: Field to manage any carrier incompatibility reason to prevent Load

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.UnitYardVisit
class.meta: Domain entity representing the handling of a Unit within a Yard

many-to-one.name: uyvUfv
many-to-one.meta: The UnitFacilityVisit to which this UnitYardVisit belongs

property.name: uyvPkey
property.meta: The SPARCS index for this UYV. This is ONLY used in SPARCS Import processing.

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.imdg.Hazards
class.meta: Domain entity representing a batch of hazardous cargo

property.name: hzrdOwnerEntityName
property.meta: The Entity Name of the owner entity

property.name: hzrdOwnerEntityGkey
property.meta: The Gkey of the owner entity

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.imdg.HazardItem
class.meta: Domain entity representing a component of hazardous cargo

property.name: hzrdiNbrType
property.meta: The Hazard Number classification (United Nations / North America)

property.name: hzrdiImdgCode
property.meta: Base IMDG Class as a string (does not include explosive class, i.e. 1.2, not 1.2B

property.name: hzrdiERGNumber
property.meta: The Emergency Response Guide Number that defines how accidents need to be handled.

property.name: hzrdiWeight
property.meta: Net weight in kilos of the hazardous material

property.name: hzrdiPlannerRef
property.meta: DG-reference number as allocated by the central planner

property.name: hzrdiMoveMethod
property.meta: Originated from customer BCT: method by which the CFS will be moved (FORK, etc)

property.name: hzrdiNotes
property.meta: Some notes for this hazard item.

many-to-one.name: hzrdiFireCode
many-to-one.meta: The fire code for this hazard item

property.name: hzrdiSeq
property.meta: Sequence Number for this hazard item

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.imdg.HazardItemPlacard
class.meta: Domain entity representing Labels for Hazardous Item

many-to-one.name: hzrdipPlacard
many-to-one.meta: Dangerous Goods Label Markings. It's fairly normal to have up to 5 placards but there could be more.

property.name: hzrdipDescription
property.meta: Description of hazard item label. The hazards/risks can be described here.

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.imdg.Placard
class.meta: Scoped entity representing Placards in inventory model

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.imdg.HazardFireCode
class.meta: Domain entity representing the mapping for the local hazard fire codes

many-to-one.name: firecodeComplex
many-to-one.meta: Complex for this local fire code mapping

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.UnitEquipDamages
class.meta: Domain entity representing collection of damages for unit equipment

property.name: dmgsOwnerEntityName
property.meta: The Entity Name of the owner entity

property.name: dmgsOwnerEntityGkey
property.meta: The Gkey of the owner entity

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.UnitEquipDamageItem
class.meta: Domain entity representing damage of the unit equipment

many-to-one.name: dmgitemDmgs
many-to-one.meta: The collection of damages this item belongs to

many-to-one.name: dmgitemType
many-to-one.meta: Damage Type: Examples are BT=BENT, BW=BOWED, CU=CUT, HD=HOLE

many-to-one.name: dmgitemComponent
many-to-one.meta: Damage Component: Examples DAH=Door with Hardware, CPA =Corner Post Assembly, FPB = Flooring-Plain Blank, PAA = Panel Assembly

property.name: dmgitemLocation
property.meta: Damage Location: Free form entry field which for MnR typically involves something like LT13 (Left Top panels 1 through 3).

property.name: dmgitemQuantity
property.meta: Damage Quantity: Used for things like multiple cracks, pin-holes, etc. Optional entry

property.name: dmgitemLength
property.meta: Damage Length: Length of damaged area (optional)

property.name: dmgitemWidth
property.meta: Damage Width: Width of damaged area (optional)

property.name: dmgitemDepth
property.meta: Damage Depth: Depth of damaged area (optional)

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.imdg.ObservedPlacard
class.meta: Domain entity representing a single observed placard

many-to-one.name: obsplacardUnit
many-to-one.meta: The Unit to which this ObservedPlacard pertains

many-to-one.name: obsplacardPlacard
many-to-one.meta: Dangerous Goods Label Markings. It's fairly normal to have up to 5 placards but there could be more.

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.ReeferRecord
class.meta: Domain entity representing a single reefer recording

many-to-one.name: rfrecUnit
many-to-one.meta: The Unit to which this ReeferRecord pertains

property.name: rfrecVentUnit
property.meta: Unit(%,cubic feet per minute, etc. that goes with the vent setting field)

property.name: rfrecAreDrainsOpen
property.meta: Status of drains (O - Open; C - Closed).

property.name: rfrecFanSetting
property.meta: Fan setting (H - High; L - Low; A - Alt)

property.name: rfrecSensor1Tmp
property.meta: Temperature read at sensor 1 inside the reefer container (USDA mandated).

property.name: rfrecSensor2Tmp
property.meta: Temperature read at sensor 2 inside the reefer container (USDA mandated).

property.name: rfrecSensor3Tmp
property.meta: Temperature read at sensor 3 inside the reefer container (USDA mandated).

property.name: rfrecSensor4Tmp
property.meta: Temperature read at sensor 4 inside the reefer container (USDA mandated).

property.name: rfrecIsAlarmOn
property.meta: True if Reefer alarm is on.

property.name: rfrecCreationRefId
property.meta: unique creation reference; used in code for reference to create new reefer record by unit

property.name: sruleRoundUpHours
property.meta: Roundup the hours as days. Example: 12 - means 12 hour and above will be rounded to 1 day. 0 Means no rounding - default

property.name: sruleRoundUpMinutes
property.meta: Roundup the minutes as hours. Example: 30 - means 30 and above minutes will be rounded as 1 hour. 0 Means no rounding - default

property.name: sruleIsRuleForPower
property.meta: Is rule is applicable for Storage or Reefer Power charge (Y/N) (default is for Storage (N).

property.name: sruleStartDayCuttOffHours
property.meta: Reefer power day is counted if the start date hour is before the cut off hours

property.name: sruleEndDayCuttOffHours
property.meta: Reefer power day is counted if the end date hour is before the cut off hours

property.name: srulePowerChargeBy
property.meta: Power charge is computed by HOUR or DAYS..

property.name: srulePowerFirstTierRounding
property.meta: Reefer power first tier is rounded to 24 or 12

property.name: srulePowerOtherTierRounding
property.meta: Reefer power after first tier is rounded to 8 or 6

property.name: sruleIsFreeTimeChgedIfExceeded
property.meta: Charge free time if free period is exceeded. (default value is False)

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.TbdUnit
class.meta: A To Be Determined Unit - a placeholder for Unit for which we do not yet know the equipment

property.name: tbduTruckTransactionGkey
property.meta: The gKey of the Truck Transaction that created this TbdUnit

property.name: tbduCategory
property.meta: The Category of the Unit (Import, Export, ...).

property.name: tbduVisitState
property.meta: The current state of the Unit with respect to this Facility.

property.name: tbduClass
property.meta: The class of Equipment: Container, Chassis, ....

property.name: tbduPickInstruction
property.meta: A human-readable, non-parseable instruction to the CHE operator describing the desired container

property.name: tbduSerialRanges
property.meta: A list of acceptable serial number ranges, packed into a string

property.name: tbduRequiresPower
property.meta: True if Unit needs power to its reefer unit, or, in case of porthole reefer, forced air

property.name: tbduGoodsAndCtrWtKg
property.meta: Goods and Container weight in Kgs (gross weight)

property.name: tbduIsHazardous
property.meta: TRUE if the Goods contain hazardous substances (denormalization)

property.name: tbduImdgTypes
property.meta: Comma delimitted list of IMDG types within the Unit (denormalization)

many-to-one.name: tbduDepartureOrderItem
many-to-one.meta: The order via which the subject Equipment will depart the Complex

property.name: tbduStowFactor
property.meta: Stow Factor for the Unit. The field is computed and managed by XPS.

property.name: tbduIsPendingDelete
property.meta: TbdUnit that is marked for deletion.

property.name: tbduYardPosition
property.meta: TBDUnit position (block or block plus row. The field is assigned and managed by XPS.

property.name: tbduCarrierIncompatibleReason
property.meta: Field to manage any carrier incompatibility reason to prevent Load

property.name: idoId
property.meta: User defined transport delivery order Id

property.name: idoIssueDate
property.meta: Date the transport delivery order was issued.

property.name: idoExpiryDate
property.meta: The Day the transport delivery order expires.

property.name: idoIgnoreDamages
property.meta: If true then the order does not care if container is damaged.

many-to-one.name: idoIbCv
many-to-one.meta: Optional original inbound carrier (e.g. Vessel Visit)

many-to-one.name: idoObCarrierOperator
many-to-one.meta: Designated Trucking Company, Railroad or Barge Operator

many-to-one.name: idoComplex
many-to-one.meta: Complex for this Import Delivery Order

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.GoodsDeclaration
class.meta: Domain entity represents the goods declaration of an Unit Goods

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.GoodsDocuments
class.meta: Domain entity representing the customs documents being associated with an Unit Goods

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.imdg.HazardousGoods
class.meta: reference entity representing hazardous goods lookup data

property.name: hzgoodsNbrType
property.meta: The Hazard Number classification (United Nations / North America)

property.name: hzgoodsImdgClass
property.meta: Primary class of the hazardous goods

many-to-one.name: hzgoodsPlacard
many-to-one.meta: Placard that needs to be used for this Hazardous goods

property.name: hzgoodsIsPlacardOptional
property.meta: Indicates whether the Placard is optional

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.imdg.SubsidiaryRisk
class.meta: Entity representing subsidiary risk lookup data

many-to-one.name: subriskHazardousGoods
many-to-one.meta: Susbsidiary risk associated with hazardous goods

many-to-one.name: subriskPlacard
many-to-one.meta: Placard that needs to be used for the Subsidiary Risk

property.name: subriskIsPlacardOptional
property.meta: Indicates whether the Placard is optional

property.name: subriskImdgClass
property.meta: Subsidiary risk of the hazardous goods

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.UnitFlag
class.subselect: SELECT sf.gkey gkey, sf.operator_gkey operator_gkey,sf.complex_gkey complex_gkey, sft.id id, sft.purpose flag, sft.is_covert_hold_required covert, sf.placed_time applied_date, sf.placed_by applied_by, sf.applied_to_natural_key applied_to, sf.created created, sf.creator creator, sf.changed changed, sf.changer changer, sf.reference_id ref_id, sf.note note, hpv.id hp_view, iu.gkey unit, ibzu.id ib_operator, ibzu.gkey ib_operator_gkey, ibzu.name ib_operator_name, obzu.id ob_operator, obzu.gkey ob_operator_gkey, obzu.name ob_operator_name, ibcv.carrier_mode ib_carrier_mode, obcv.carrier_mode ob_carrier_mode, opr.id eqp_operator, opr.gkey eqp_opr_gkey, opr.name eqp_operator_name, owr.id eqp_owner, owr.gkey eqp_own_gkey, owr.name eqp_owner_name FROM srv_flags sf LEFT OUTER JOIN srv_flag_types sft on sf.flag_type_gkey = sft.gkey LEFT OUTER JOIN srv_hold_perm_view hpv on sft.hold_perm_view_gkey = hpv.gkey, inv_unit iu LEFT OUTER JOIN inv_unit_fcy_visit iufv on iu.active_ufv = iufv.gkey LEFT OUTER JOIN argo_carrier_visit ibcv on iufv.actual_ib_cv = ibcv.gkey LEFT OUTER JOIN ref_bizunit_scoped ibzu on ibcv.operator_gkey = ibzu.gkey LEFT OUTER JOIN argo_carrier_visit obcv on iufv.actual_ob_cv = obcv.gkey LEFT OUTER JOIN ref_bizunit_scoped obzu on obcv.operator_gkey = obzu.gkey LEFT OUTER JOIN inv_unit_equip uequip on iu.primary_ue = uequip.gkey LEFT OUTER JOIN inv_eq_state eqs on uequip.eqs_gkey = eqs.gkey LEFT OUTER JOIN ref_bizunit_scoped opr on eqs.eq_operator_gkey = opr.gkey LEFT OUTER JOIN ref_bizunit_scoped owr on eqs.eq_owner_gkey = owr.gkey where sf.applied_to_gkey = iu.gkey
class.meta: Domain entity for unit Holds and Permissions

id.name: unitflgGkey
id.meta: The gkey of Flag entity assigned to this entity

property.name: unitflgId
property.meta: The short id assigned from flag type

property.name: unitflgAppliedBy
property.meta: Name of the user who placed this Hold/Permission

property.name: unitflgAppliedTo
property.meta: The natural key of the Unit Entity to which this Hold/Permission is applied

property.name: unitflgRefId
property.meta: Reference information recorded with this Unit's Hold/Permission

property.name: unitflgNote
property.meta: Note recorded with this unit's Hold/Permission

property.name: unitflgHpvId
property.meta: A unique identifier for the hold or permission view

many-to-one.name: unitflgUnit
many-to-one.meta: The unit to which this Hold/Permission was applied

property.name: unitflgIBOprGkey
property.meta: The gkey of inbound carrier visit operator

property.name: unitflgIBOpr
property.meta: The Inbound carrier visit operator Id

property.name: unitflgIBOprName
property.meta: The Inbound carrier visit operator Name

property.name: unitflgOBOprGkey
property.meta: The gkey of outbound carrier visit operator

property.name: unitflgOBOpr
property.meta: The outbound carrier visit operator Id

property.name: unitflgOBOprName
property.meta: The outbound carrier visit operator name

property.name: unitflgEqpOprGkey
property.meta: The gkey of the line operator (shipping line) currently registered as the equipment operator

property.name: unitflgEqpOpr
property.meta: The id of the line operator (shipping line) currently registered as the equipment operator

property.name: unitflgEqpOwnGkey
property.meta: The gkey of the line operator (shipping line) currently registered as the equipment Owner

property.name: unitflgEqpOprName
property.meta: The name of the line operator (shipping line) currently registered as the equipment operator

property.name: unitflgEqpOwner
property.meta: The line operator id(shipping line) that owns the primary equipment

property.name: unitflgEqpOwnerName
property.meta: The line operator name(shipping line) that owns the primary equipment

property.name: unitflgOperator
property.meta: The Operator gkey to which this Flag belongs

property.name: unitflgComplex
property.meta: The Complex gkey to which this Flag belongs

class.name: com.navis.inventory.business.units.UnitChargeableUnitEvent
class.subselect: select ufv.gkey ufv_gkey, cue.gkey gkey, cue.gkey cue_gkey from inv_unit_fcy_visit ufv, argo_chargeable_unit_events cue where ufv.gkey = cue.ufv_gkey
class.meta: Domain entity to join unit and chargeable unit event

id.name: unitCueGkey
id.meta: The gkey of chargeable unit event
